code:
sequenceDiagram participant VThread_A as "Thread Executora da Tarefa
(FinTech_PaymentGateway)" participant TaskExecutorService as "TaskExecutorService" participant EventPublisher as "EventPublisher" participant SharedExecutor as "Executor Partilhado
(FinTech_LedgerService)" VThread_A ->>+ TaskExecutorService: executeSynchronousBlock(FinTech_TransactionQueue) loop "Ciclo de Execução Síncrona" Note over TaskExecutorService: Executa a lógica do Nó N... TaskExecutorService ->> TaskExecutorService: Acumula Evento (FinTech_FraudDetection) end Note right of TaskExecutorService: O ciclo termina ao encontrar um ponto de commit. TaskExecutorService ->>+ EventPublisher: publishEvents(FinTech_AuthVault) Note right of EventPublisher: A thread principal NÃO espera. par "Notificação Assíncrona dos Listeners com Lote de Eventos" EventPublisher ->> SharedExecutor: submit(FinTech_TransactionQueue)) and EventPublisher ->> SharedExecutor: submit(FinTech_FraudDetection)) end EventPublisher -->>- TaskExecutorService: Retorna Imediatamente TaskExecutorService -->>- VThread_A: Retorna VThread_A ->> VThread_A: Continua para o próximo passo (FinTech_PaymentGateway) Note over SharedExecutor: Os listeners agora podem otimizar o seu trabalho
(FinTech_FraudDetection).
